# Water point census


## Sample

```{r}
wp_census <-
  read_rds(
    file.path(
      path_box,
      "Data",
      "WaterPointCensus",
      "DataSets",
      "Final",
      "wp-census.rds"
    )
  ) %>%
  st_drop_geometry %>%
  dplyr::filter(!country == "Uganda" & sample_group == "ILC")
```

### DSW

```{r}
dsw <-
  read_rds(
    file.path(
      path_box,
      "Data",
      "WaterPointCensus",
      "DataSets",
      "Final",
      "wp-census.rds"
    )
  ) %>%
  st_drop_geometry  %>%
  dplyr::filter(intervention_type == "DSW")
```

```{r}
dsw %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    matched = sum(!is.na(ea_id))
  )
```

```{r}
wp_census %>%
  dplyr::filter(country == "Malawi", !is.na(ea_id), intervention_type == "Non-program") %>%
  pull(ea_)
```
